# 时空太乙

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shikong-taiyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shikong-taiyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shikong-taiyi
shikong-taiyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shikong-taiyi
shikong-taiyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
